video.title: The Adventures of Puss in Boots
video.synopsis: The world's greatest feline fighter, lover and milk connoisseur takes on daring adventures in exotic locations in this family-friendly comedy series.

episodes.synopsis: Puss must protect the magically veiled city of San Lorenzo after he exposes it to the world by accidentally reversing an ancient protective spell.
episodes.title: Hidden

episodes.synopsis: Puss accidentally gives the orphans a magic sugar that proves to be dangerous -- and the only cure is guarded by a powerful Sphinx.
episodes.title: Sphinx

episodes.synopsis: When Toby's ninja brothers try to get him to steal San Lorenzo‘s treasure, he must decide between them and his friendship with Puss.
episodes.title: Brothers

episodes.synopsis: The Duchess, who wants to rule the world by harnessing the power of sorcerers, captures Artephius...and it's up to Puss to rescue him.
episodes.title: Duchess

episodes.synopsis: Puss is tricked into going on a quest with an old friend, Jack Sprat. What starts out as a mission to save a princess soon turns dangerous.
episodes.title: Adventure

episodes.synopsis: In an effort to save Puss's old mentor, El Guante Blanco, Puss and Dulcinea embark on an adventure to find the Fountain of Youth.
episodes.title: Fountains

episodes.synopsis: Puss tries to convince the Mayor that he is really a hero -- but being "brave" quickly goes to the Mayor's head.
episodes.title: Bravery

episodes.synopsis: The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With the help of Artephius, Puss may finally defeat his foe.
episodes.title: Golem

episodes.synopsis: By stealing enchanted boots from the Treasure House, Jack Sprat sets off a dangerous Devil Wind that threatens to consume all of the town's treasure.
episodes.title: Boots

episodes.synopsis: Dulcinea becomes enchanted with heroic powers when she pulls a magical sword from a stone, and Puss must help her learn how to control her strength.
episodes.title: Sword
